title: He Has Returned
body:
http://s1.dmcdn.net/JSIwz/x240--X2.jpg

https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sNvIz7gjHfU/VtSg3enU7gI/AAAAAAAA4cI/iMTbl5ly9Ng/s1600/423423.jpg

Dammit, Bard, you're the reason it took so long to get our dragon champion.

replies.body: I had the same idea on an earlier post, i mean who left league aside from the egg bard flew away. so maybe the egg hatched and the dragon inside is returning. btw on the teaser a rioter posted on someones comment saying something about how the person earned a cookie, what she said was aurelion sol could be a star dragon since sol not only means sun , but star as well.

> [{quoted}](name=SupermanRisen,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=iYFkuOTz,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-03-01T02:32:45.670+0000)
>
> I had the same idea on an earlier post, i mean who left league aside from the egg bard flew away. so maybe the egg hatched and the dragon inside is returning. btw on the teaser a rioter posted on someones comment saying something about how the person earned a cookie, what she said was aurelion sol could be a star dragon since sol not only means sun , but star as well.

tbh, I thought this basically confirmed that Aurelion Sol isn't a sun dragon or storm dragon.

HE'S A SPACE DRAGON USING THE POWER OF THE STARS.

Space dragon?
http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/metroid/images/8/87/SM_Ridley.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150701091354

> [{quoted}](name=A Superb Villain,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=iYFkuOTz,comment-id=000200000001,timestamp=2016-03-01T02:40:15.519+0000)
>
> Space dragon?
> http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/metroid/images/8/87/SM_Ridley.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150701091354

idk what the hell that thing is but it sure as hell ain't a space dragon. That's like a booger of a dragon combined with an insect.

http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/hellcat/images/8/8d/Earth_bound_dragon_planet_space_fantasy_hd-wallpaper-1798295.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20150820060515

THIS is a space dragon....albeit not the best but a bit more than acceptable lol.

BLASPHEMY!

Dost thou not know of the majesty that is Ridley?! Commander of the Space Pirates! Nemesis of the Hunter Samus Aran! Butcher of K-2L!
All I heard was booger dragon+insect
You have my sympathies.
i mean, I get the dragon part, but its not much of a booger dragon, too solid, and its not much of an insect dragon, to few legs and the wrong kind of wings.
There's no way such a huge amount of people on the internet have no sense of humor

I prefer meta ridley.
http://vignette3.wikia.nocookie.net/metroid/images/1/10/Metaridley.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20080902035449
According to the early champion concept and the post riot made, it will be an Asian dragon

> [{quoted}](name=Annoying Catz,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=iYFkuOTz,comment-id=00020000000100000001,timestamp=2016-03-01T06:02:32.305+0000)
>
> According to the early champion concept and the post riot made, it will be an Asian dragon

that isn't accurate anymore we think.
Riot mentioned that the champ has come a long way since then

But...the actual...space dragon...

http://cdn.bulbagarden.net/upload/thumb/6/66/484Palkia.png/250px-484Palkia.png

I looked it up on wikipedia

> It represents spatial matter whereas Dialga represents time and Giratina represents dimension and antimatter

As far as I understand, Palka represents space, but not like ''Space, plantes, aliens'' and that kind of stuff.
For example, if you open an empty box, there's empty space in the box, right?
That's the space Palkia represents.



Or I'm just retarded, that's another option...
{{summoner:31}}

Only actual dragons in space I've ever seen in anime/vidja games (well... excluding bahamut zero... and maybe dragonball's dragons... and spore creations don't count, damn it) are the "Executioners" from SO3.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xzdhYY2pbWo&t=8h00m57s (took friggin' forever to find a video)
#SinnohConfirmed
*ahem* sky dragon.

U wot?
In Destiny Deoxys a meteor, containing Deoxys' crystal (or something), fell through Rayquaza's territory, making him angry and stuff. You bet Rayquaza comes from space c:
LOL I actually remember this shit?
{{summoner:31}}

Rayquaza inhabits the upper atmosphere, tethering on the edge between space and sky. He can fly amidst _both_ and you're _both_ right.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SjNPFLel0a4

the reason why he is wrong is thusly

a space dragon is one that can manipulate space.

a sky dragon is one that can manipulate sky.

manipulating space entails that you can manipulate any form of matter.

manipulating sky means that you can manipulate gases, and create winds.

in pokemon there is 1 true space dragon

in pokemon there is 1 true sky dragon.

in pokemon 4 dragons can travel through space.

in pokemon 18 dragons can travel through the sky.

not all of the dragons that can travel through something should be considered dragons of that element.

the four dragons that travel space are Palkia, Dialga, Giritina, and Rayquaza. the space dragon is Palkia. Dialga is not a space dragon, it is a time dragon. there is no argument here. Giritina is not a space dragon, it is an antimatter dragon, there is no argument here. Rayquaza is not a space dragon, it is a sky dragon, there shouldn't be an argument here.

the 18 dragons that can traverse the skies are dragonair, dragonite, altaria, salamence, latias, latios, rayquaza, reshiram, zekrom, kyurem, charizard, flygon, dialga, palkia, giritina, hydreigon, and noivern.
Dragonair and dragonite are basic dragons with no special attunement, they are not sky dragons. altaria is tied more to clouds than the sky itself, so it is not a true sky dragon, salamence is tied more to aggression than the sky, and is not a sky dragon, latias and latios are tied to speed, and are not sky dragons, rayquaza is a sky dragon tied to all of the sky, reshiram is not related to the sky in any way past traveling through it, and is a fire energy dragon, zekrom is lightly tied to the sky, but is tied more closely with electricity energy, kyurem is only capabe of flight when it is tied to zekrom or reshiram, and is based closely two a lack of energy, or ice, charizard is a true fire dragon, that is only a true dragon when under the affects of mega evolution, flygon is tied closer to sandstorms than to the sky itself, dialge palkia and giritina can only travel through the sky by merit of them not needing it and being able to bend reality, hydreigon can fly but is more representative of darkness, and noivern is more related to sound than to the sky.

based on this incredible list of things that i just pointed out that really only scratches the surface as to why ray is not a space dragon, specifically the fact that no dragons in pokemon share the same themes ever, and something traveling through a medium does not make it something. I think we should be able to decipher that he is wrong.

if you want to get even farther into this argument, I suggest your next move to follow up on this one is to try to convince me that rayquaza is a robot dragon, because in destiny deoxys rayquaza travels through a bunch of robots, and by your logic that makes it a robot dragon.

The thing is that the space that palkia rules is this one:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Space

It controls the 3-dimensional room.

But here everybody is talking about this kind of space:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Outer_space
the stuff that is outside the atmosphere of the earth.
Garchomp WHERe?
I don't remember garchomp being able to fly, or able to go through space. it might but I "m pretty sure its land based.
So does dragonair :D can't either fly or go through space.
Can't believe so many people don't know about the Metroid, lol. Have my upvote.
Star Guardian Sol confirmed?
They **did** say they were working on another star gardian skin for an... _unusual_...champion

> [{quoted}](name=The Last Ballad,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=iYFkuOTz,comment-id=0002000000020000,timestamp=2016-03-02T02:12:51.824+0000)
>
> They **did** say they were working on another star gardian skin for an... _unusual_...champion

Oh, thought that was Star guardian {{champion:44}}
I actually hope so now. (Urgot is ugly no matter how you slice it. Well, maybe in half)
Though {{champion:6}} would certainly count...(Just look it up, it's either glorious or horrifying, depending on your type of humor)
STAR POWER!!!!!!

FOOLSSS CAN'T YOU SEE A GOD WHEN YOU LOOK AT IT??

http://41.media.tumblr.com/8e35f55f8ffe05d5d8d48e1af9256702/tumblr_n1ikhyOubB1rk5dgco1_1280.png
https://40.media.tumblr.com/c9ed1daa31b81eea332c24e2be65c34e/tumblr_n25g6iQtZ71rvt1x8o1_1280.png

I'm just waiting for the majestic creature to come down and say, "I ain't cleaning your mess up. Do it your self." Then it will rise back to the heavens in which some one will say,"But how!?" and it will respond with,"I don't know, go look it up or something."

But in all seriousness I'm pretty sure your right on this one. Can't say I didn't see it coming though.
That would be magnificent, and maybe a bit appropriate as well, since it could very well be that Aurelion Sol is extremely young. He may not know what to do with the powers in his possession.

Man if that's true I want him to talk like how I wanted Bard to talk when he was shown.

By saying broddy, brah, dude, dudet, gnarly and mando.

"Like ya this whole ending the world thing is like, a super bummer man. But don't worry we got like mando minutes before it happens. So like ya know, no biggy."

:^)
Needs to be a legendary. Pool Party Aurelion.
Star Guardian Sol inbound.
Complete with frilly skirt and bows.

http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/monsterhunter/images/8/8b/MH4-Shagaru_Magala_Screenshot_008.png/revision/latest?cb=20150204182945

Tell Sol he is prettiest princess.

**NOW.**
Isn't that the evolved form of the gore magala?
It is. The Shagaru Magala.

He has returned; a dinosaur's story

So the egg hatched in Bard's care.
Please tell me the lil' thing speaks just like his caretaker.
Inb4 trumpet toting dragon confirmed.

That makes a shit ton of sense.

They reveal champs on patch day right as it goes out. So the earliest we'll see his reveal is thursday (since thats when they release patches).  If not then then next week for sure as this cycle should be ending soon. 

However, this isn't to say something won't get leaked....
